#include <stdio.h>
#define ll long long int

inline int read()
{
int t=0;
char ch;
ch=getchar_unlocked();
while(ch<'0'||ch>'9')
ch=getchar_unlocked();
while(ch<='9'&& ch>='0')
{
t=(t<<3)+(t<<1)+ch-'0';
ch=getchar_unlocked();
}
return t;
}
ll mod_exp(ll b,ll e,ll m)	//	base,exp,mod
{
	//printf("# %lld %lld %lld\n",b,e,m);
	ll res=1;
	b%=m;
	while(e)
	{
		if(e%2)
			res=(res*b)%m;
		e/=2;
		b=(b*b)%m;
	}
	return res;
}

int main(void)
{
	ll t,in,res,mod=10000007L;
	t=read();
	while(t--)
	{
		in=read();
		res=mod_exp(2,in,mod);
		if(in%2)
			res--;
		else
			res++;
		printf("%lld\n",res);
	}
	return 0;
}
